title: 98: Prospect Roulette & ‘Blink’ Scouting
itunes:title: 98: Prospect Roulette & ‘Blink’ Scouting
description:
Former NFL scouts Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks lead off the episode playing a game of “Blink Scouting”, sharing the first word that comes to mind for various players in this year’s draft. Then, the guys jump into some Prospect Roulette before wrapping the show breaking down some safety and offensive tackle prospects in this year's draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
